overview:
Stephan is responsible for overseeing all finance functions, including accounting, forecasting, modeling, cash management, internal controls, GAAP reporting, and more.

Prior to joining the company in 2008, Stephan served as Auditor for some of the most prestigious international financial services firms, including BDO, Greenwoods Financial Group, and RÃ¶dl & Partner. Stephan comes to So-Cal by way of So-Africa, where he completed his Bachelors in Commerce & Accounting at the University of Pretoria (while playing rugby), and took Honors in Accounting Science at the University of South Africa. He is an internationally certified CPA.

When not crunching numbers, he unwinds by mountain biking, snowboarding, surfing and hiking.
